comment._content: The famous and much decorated African-American regiment "The Hell Fighters". en.wikipedia.org/wiki/369th_Infantry_Regiment_(United_Sta... The Regimental Band was led by James Reese Europe to international acclaim; they made several recordings. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Reese_Europe www.redhotjazz.com/hellfighters.html
